pages.text: Mounts can be bred to pass down characteristics such as health, speed, and coloration of the parents, although sometimes mutations may occur.$(br2)To breed mounts:$(li)both must be tame$(li)both must have full health$(li)both must have a suitable breeding item$(li)at least one must be standing

$(br2)If a baby mount is given a warped fungus, it will actually grow smaller rather than larger when it matures.$(br2)Such mounts can only be ridden by particularly small riders.$(br2)Crimson fungus will negate the shrinking effect if provided to the baby mount before it has matured.
